thread.title: Best Freaking Hotel in all of New York!
thread.title_full: Best Freaking Hotel in all of New York! - Review of ONE UN New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kboyce1986
title: Best Freaking Hotel in all of New York!
text: I recommend this hotel. 5 stars!!!Everything was amazing at this place! Especially the Manager Ms. Melvita and Kazi in the Sky Lounge. Their service was excellent, they went above and beyond. Our room was amazing, we loved the view. The security was great! Definitely will stay many more times in the future.
